[[inst_sd_xor]]
==== SD.XOR

*Syntax:* sd.xor<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Xor operation: memory value is atomically xored with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sd_xor.svg[SD.XOR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
